rule.condition: same(status in $L.file, NULL) and current.phase in $L.file="open"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Status in CurrentRecord = NULL AND Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "open")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">open</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status "New" (when ( Status in CurrentRecord = NULL AND Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "open"))
